TypeSignature.Value: public class Rss20FeedFormatter<TSyndicationFeed> : System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter where TSyndicationFeed : SyndicationFeednew()
.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Rss20FeedFormatter`1<.ctor (class System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed) TSyndicationFeed> extends System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter

Docs.summary: A class that serializes -derived classes to RSS 2.0 format.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Use this class to serialize instances of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> derived classes. If you need to serialize a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> instance, use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter> formatter instead.
## Examples The following code shows how to create a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> derived class and serialize it to RSS 2.0.
[!code-vb[RssFormatter#3](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.servicemodel.sy_2_1.vb)] [!code-cs[RssFormatter#3](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.servicemodel.sy_2_1.cs)]

Docs.param: A value that specifies whether to serialize elements that are defined in the Atom 1.0 specification, but not in the RSS 2.0 specification. The default is .
Docs.summary: Creates a new instance of the class with the specified derived instance.

remarks.format:
## Remarks If the `serializeExtensionsAsAtom` parameter is `true`, all elements defined in the Atom 1.0 specification that are not defined in the RSS 2.0 specification are serialized with the Atom 1.0 namespace.
